attr.title: Slime Crown
attr.desc: Slime Crown is a colorful Pixel Art Game with a unique but challenging Gameplay. The Colors Green, Blue, Red and Yellow are the Key to Success.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1519820/Slime_Crown/) and copy all game files into `assets` folder.
